about_the_game:
This DLC contains three features: Bonus renders, gallery unlocker and a feature to bypass love/corruption points requirement.

Bonus Renders
It contains 142 new renders that can be found in the 'Bonus renders' folder.
The 'Bonus renders' folder is located in the game folder. To find it, right-click on Fate and Life: The Mystery of Vaulinhorn in your Steam library and select Manage > Browse local files.

Gallery Unlocker
With this DLC, you will find a new 'Gallery Unlocker' feature that will unlock all scenes of the game. You can find it in the replays menu.

Bypass Love/Corruption Points Requirement
With this DLC, you can bypass Love/Corruption points requirement to unlock certain scenes. This feature will automatically appear when a choice requires some love/corruption point.

content_descriptors.notes: The DLC contains textual depictions of nudity as well as uncensored sexual content acts. All characters depicted are over the age of 18.

detailed_description:
This DLC contains three features: Bonus renders, gallery unlocker and a feature to bypass love/corruption points requirement.

Bonus Renders
It contains 142 new renders that can be found in the 'Bonus renders' folder.
The 'Bonus renders' folder is located in the game folder. To find it, right-click on Fate and Life: The Mystery of Vaulinhorn in your Steam library and select Manage > Browse local files.

Gallery Unlocker
With this DLC, you will find a new 'Gallery Unlocker' feature that will unlock all scenes of the game. You can find it in the replays menu.

Bypass Love/Corruption Points Requirement
With this DLC, you can bypass Love/Corruption points requirement to unlock certain scenes. This feature will automatically appear when a choice requires some love/corruption point.

  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750 or better, AMD equivalent
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
